# Tier 1 TOC.md Template

Use for small documentation sets (< 30 files).

## Template

```markdown
# {name} Documentation Structure

## Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `contents/file1.md` | {brief description from first paragraph} |
| `contents/file2.md` | {brief description} |
| `contents/subdir/file3.md` | {brief description} |
```

## Guidelines

- Simple flat list of all files
- Extract description from first paragraph of each file
- Include full path from contents/
- Sort alphabetically or by logical order
